content.detailedDescription:
1:  i was walking home from the movies with my girlfriend, and as we approached the gate to her backyard, i happen to look up at the starts because it was such a clear night, when i noticed that one of them moved slightly to the right?  i asked her if she could see the same thing, and she replied yes.  as we kept watching the star flew off to the right at a high speed, and this is facing north. then slowly one of the other two that were left move west then circled around the one star that was very still. suddenly the first star came back at a slower speed. the two moving stars made a complete circle around the lone stationary star, then all of a sudden all three flew at a tremendous 
speed in three different directions. we stared for a while, but they never came back.
i realized they were not stars, but i have an open mind
i was exited to see that happen. we went inside and told her parents about it, but i don't think they believed us at all?

2:  in 1961, my best friend an i went to the isle of white off of  the south coast of england. one night after a couple of drinks at the local pub near ryde we were walking back to our hotel around 12 midnight, and the stars were very very clear.  this would have been in august, exact date unknown. the thing as above happened, but with two stars that were circling each other, and suddenly took off in different direction. this happened within a period of about five minutes. after we happened we just walked home and discussed the sighting between us. the next day we heard on the radio that seven hundred people had reported the same thing, but the british airforce said it was weather balloons!

3:  sometime in the early 80's i was staying with my parent in rye england,  after about ten thirty all the street lights go out and it gets very dark. it was a clear night, and from my parents house you can see all across the fields to the sea which is about four miles away. also north is dungerness nuclear power station.  at approximately 11.30 p.M. i took my dads binoculars out in the garden to look at the stars. all of a suddenly moving from  east to west close to the nuclear power station i saw a green ball of light that changed from green to red and back. it moved very slowly, and it seemed to be about a thousand feet in the air about two miles away. i ran inside and said to my parents that i would like them to look through the glasses and tell what they see?   of course they were astonished, but then my dad told me that one night he had forgot to shut the hose off which was watering the grass. he said as he turned the water off a very bright green light shone up the whole garden, so bright that it was like day, but green. he said it went very slowly moving n.W. and suddenly shot up into the black sky like a rocket, but no sound. my father was not the type of person to make up stories either, so i believed him.
content.summary: Three stars moving!

content.detailedDescription: At approx 3:15am me and two other coworkers were walking to our cars on the corner of 5th and guadalupe in austin, texas.  me and one other co-worker saw an orange object moving across the sky in a north/northwest fashion.  the other employee said it was a plane and we said no, there were no flashing lights.  we went to our cars and noticed another orange object flying in what appeared to be in the same path.  they all originated from the same point of our view.  we counted almost 50 of these objects.  they would sometimes come one at at time then two or three.  some flew in a triangle formation.  most seem to take the same path.  this lasted for approx 15minutes. any help with this would be appreciated.
content.summary: Orange, no noise.

content.detailedDescription: My sighting happened in december 23, 1993. i was staying in sampaloc, manila, philippines. i was going up the stairway to 2nd floor of our house. upon reaching the window around 11:00 pm i moved to the window to catch a breath and look-up the sky. this i normally do everytime. what i saw is unforgettable in my life. i saw two bright orange glowing object(twinkling) in the sky of the same size which looks unsual than any bright object.They are in diagonal position. the object on the right side is higher than the left one. suddenly, they met at the middle(face to face).I was trembling then and shouted to my wife who's at the other room to come to me but she's resting already. after a few seconds they separated and went back to original position. then after a few seconds both object move simultaneously.The object on the right move straight line going to left, while the left object move straight going to the right direction. both object disappeared very fast.They move like in z formation and dissapear.Up to now i am having goose bump when i recall the incident. i told my freinds and family but nobody paid much attention. truly, i believed it's a ufo. to date, no aircraft can do such maneouver and formation with lighting speed. i can't imagine any aircraft can be built like that unless it's made by so much advance intelligence and technology. it's unbelievable but i saw it in my own naked eyes.
content.summary: Unbelievable but i saw it happened truly with my naked eyes.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving west on us 50 near cisco, utah about 02:05am when an amber disc rotating conter clockwise came up from behind a hill and was probably 200 feet in the air.  the car shut off and lost all power and came to a stop in the midlle of the 2 lane road.  last iheard from am radio was the time - 2:08 am ksl am salt lake city utah.  the next i knew was leaning out the window watching something moving across the sky to the soutwest.  the car tried to start and died as  clutch was engaged.  the radio was playing a song and then the dj sad it was 2:44am got car started and drove on.
content.summary: Amber disc over hill lost time.

content.detailedDescription:
View as web page 
observed some strange goings on last night. we live in the country outside of monroe city in. on the evening of  04/ 22/09 i thought i saw an iridium flare but this one had a top rectangle and a bottom rectangle that would trade places lighting up. i went into my shed building and returned outside in about 5 mins to view the western sky again. this time a rectangle appeared to the north north west and lit up again. this time some object shot out of it and at first it appeared to be a red flare with a contrail behind it. the red object then turned to white and started a white strobe and headed off to the west like any type of regular plane or jet. the large rectangular object lost its glow and disappeared from my view. all this occurred after 900 pm around total darkness. a passenger or military jet coming from the north should have seen this thing as they were above and to the north of it, about 30-45 secs away from the object but at a much higher altitude. 

 

about a month ago.. approx one week after a new communications tower was constructed to the south of us. four red lights were observed to the north west of this new tower. at first i thought they were red flares from a plane but the lights didn���t move and i didn���t see or hear any planes in the area. the red lights were evenly spaced and if they were connected this object was huge. the lights blinked out one at a time and in order and i didn���t see them again or any other strange happenings that evening.
content.summary: Rectangular or upright cylinder with red object (then turned white) leaving it.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 10:00 p.M., i witnessed a sight that astonished my wife as well as myself. we left my daughter's  home (2 mi from ellerbe going home). we noticed a bright light more brighter than the sun. we were struck with awe and amazement. we did not say anything to each other until we left the wooded area. i can not say anything about this in my town. i have lived in ellerbe for 47 years. the church i attend is presbyterian and they have a different opinion on a lot of things as well as i served on the board of deacons.

i know of a person who works with the cia.  i had to keep mum around that
individual. 
 
i would like to know if someone else has had the same experience as my wife and i have had. if so,  e-mail me at wep_1941@yahoo.Com.

thanks a lot if you read and believe this report.
content.summary: Bright light at night.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down to go to sleep when i looked out my bedroom window and noticed  six orange lights moving east to west at about 2500 feet.As i looked the object stopped and the lights broke formation and started to revolve around one another in a chaotic manner and then went into a circular pattern for about 10 to 20 seconds,then the lights went back into formation as a wedge or boomerang configuration and proceeded once again in a east to west trajectory.As i lost sight from my window i bolted out my apt door in my boxer shorts and went to the back porch of my building where i had an unobstructed view of the object as it slowly headed due west towards ocean beach.It stopped once more and repeated the previous flashing and movement sequence for 20 or so seconds and then resumed its westerly track till i lost sight of it as it went over the diamond heights neighborhood on its way towards the pacific ocean.I was gobsmacked/scared /excited and had no effing idea what it was.
content.summary: Flying v shape moved east to west over mission dist. stopped twice.

content.detailedDescription: I took my two little dogs out the other night to use the bathroom.  i almost always stay outside to watch them because of wild animals around here - racoons, snakes, other dogs, etc.  i live on lake livingston.  and while i'm outside i usually look up at the sky because i like watching for meteors.  it was a very clear night.  i noticed what looked like a star moving steadily across the sky, going from a northwesterly to southwestly direction.  i thought it could also be an airplane but the light was steady, which is what kept my attention. anyway, it moved across the sky and then just disappeared.  there were no clouds at the time.  i just thought it was kind of strange.  however, i have seen this kind of thing in the past and just thought maybe there was nothing to it, which may be the case this time.
content.summary: Small object with steady light moved across sky and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At 5:15 a.M. i stopped for a break on top of a hill on state road 182.  about a half a mile from bowens mill, ga, county of ben hill.  i was standing on the top step of my truck lookiing up into the sky, hoping to see a meteor or two.  out of the corner of my eye i noticed the lights of a jet, it was heading towards the north.  i would look at the lights of the jet periodically while scanning the sky.  ( it was dark and mostly clear night.)  at one point while watching the jet, i saw a bright camera-like flash in front of the jet. (i'm very uncertain of the distance the jet and light was from me.  i would appoximate about a mile or two.)  i thought the jet had a near miss with a meteor.  the jet kept going(of course, like it's gonna stop,) i saw another bright flash a little south of the first flash.  i thought it also was a meteor.  i kept watching and then saw, a little south of that, a light fade in and out, and then a little south of that i saw another light fade in and out at that time i felt i was seeing something unusual, that maybe these wasn't meteors. at that time a little south of the fourth light i saw a light fade in, do a s shape(like going around cones or something) and then the light faded out. it was moving in a southward direction. at that point i was surprised and very happy that i may have seen a ufo.  i kept watching but i didn't see anymore like it. first, i looked at the clock to see what time it was,and it was 5:30 a.M. then i called my wife and she acted like "yeah whatever let me go back to sleep".  then i called my dad, and he just laughed.  about around 6:00 a.M. i noticed alot of streaks criss-crossing the skies which i believe were meteors.  i saw one small airplane flying from the east going west and it turned around and went back towards the east. and that's about it.  i hope someone in the jet maybe saw the flash, being it was so close, and maybe someone else saw it from the ground.  i'm hoping it can be proved by radars.  that's all of my story.
content.summary: I saw a jet then a bright flash in front of the jet, when jet passed, saw 3 other flashes then s shape movement.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on e 34 rd also known as boon rd into town. i had stopped the car at the top of the overpass over 131 at that point i was pretty high up and could see into town. cadillac airport has a light tower that spins and can be seen all over town. the light from the tower reflected off the disc that was just hovering about a 4 way stop by the local wallmart. i only saw this happen about twice before it vanished. i've never seen anything reflect light like this disc did it was big enough to cast a shadow and from the overpass you could see only an outline. at first i thought maybe i had seen a plane come in and the light was playing tricks on my eyes so i pulled over and got out of my car to see if the light would show it again sure enough there it was. it never moved until the third time around for the light which takes a while 1-2 mins then it just ... vanished no movement nothing. i was really scared granted it was the first time i had ever seen anything like that in the skies.
content.summary: A fat disc.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw something extremely weird on 4/22/09 between the
> hour of 9:10-9:15 p.M., i know 9:15 is the end time because
> i looked at my watch right after. i was standing on my back
> deck looking up at the stars (which i usually do whenever i
> go out to smoke after dark) and noticed what i first thought
> was a satellite. i see them on occasion as i'm
> looking up at the sky. as i'm watching it, it went from
> the dim glow of what satellites look like to a very bright
> point of light that kept moving, at which point i started
> thinking maybe it's space junk re-entering the
> atmosphere... even though it was moving slower than any
> shooting star i've ever seen. it then dimmed again to
> what a satellite looks like, but i noticed at this point
> that it wasn't moving in exactly a straight line like a
> satellite would... i don't know how to explain the
> movement, generally forward, other than to say it almost
> looked like it was vibrating very tightly within a somewhat
> forward motion. it then turned into a very bright point of
> light again (still moving), dimmed, became bright again and
> did a 90 degree turn before dimming and moving behind some
> clouds. at this point i started backing toward the sliding door to the living room
> to call my 5 almost 6yr old son to come see it... i figured it was a once in a
> lifetime opportunity, and i wanted to have someone to back
> up my sighting... even if he is only about 6 years old. by
> the time i got him out, which was maybe 5-6 seconds after i
> lost sight of it's last position, a huge cloud had
> formed right over the area. i kept looking at the edges of
> the cloud at the parts of the sky i could see, but it never
> came out of the cloud bank, that i know of. it was
> originally moving from s to n and drifting slightly
> eastward, when it made the right angle turn it was moving e.
> i know it wasn't a plane as it didn't have any of
> the other lights a plane would have, and the
> brightening/dimming wasn't regular time wise. the
> brightness is something hard to describe... when it got
> bright it kind of looked like a star but without some of the
> colors you might get from the light interacting
> with the atmosphere. the best way i can describe it was that
> it looked like a fluid like point of light. it definitely
> looked like it was outside the atmosphere around the level
> of where satellites travel, which is why i at first thought
> that's what it was. i also noticed that it seemed to
> increase in size very slightly whenever the brightness
> increased. 
>  
> i have never seenanything like this before, and since i spend a fair amount
> of time looking at the sky whenever i'm outside at night
> i know what planes, shooting stars, satellites, helicopters,
> blimps, para sailors, planets,etc. look like, because i've
> seen them all in the night sky before. i also know it
> wasn't a high flying jet, or the international space
> station because those things don't make right angle
> turns.
>  
> i'm really still kind of in shock from
> what i saw...
content.summary: Point of light that makes 90 degree turn.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from a friends house with my mom and i looked into the sky and saw a strange object that looked like no plane, star, or planet.I then asked my mom what she thought it was and she also didn't know what it was. so once we got home i got out my telescope and began to search for it. once i was on it i couldn't see the onject i just saw the lights. it was flashing red,green, blue, and white. as i was watching it in my telescope it moved very fast in different directions. i then search again for it and found it. i then went to get my mom so that i would have another witness. she came out there and we observed it for about another 10-15 minutes. we then observed it without the telescope as we were watching it just vanished.
content.summary: A strange object with flashing light hovering with no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 10:35 on thursday night of april 23, 2009. i along with 6 of my friends were hanging out at their house on lyons street in clifton cincinnati. my friends jeff, brad, dave, and andy, were outside on the second floor balcony, which has a view or a small part of indiana and a large part of northern kentucky, as well as parts of cincinnati (its one of the highest points in the area, very close to the university of cincinnati) well i was sitting in my friend bobs room with him (his room connects to the balcony basically) i was looking for a song to listen to on his computer when i heard jeff and brad both screaming my name. i came running out onto the balcony and they are yelling (it's the ufo! they have reported to me seeing this same object earlier in the year but i was not apart of witnessing that.)
now i'v stood on this balcony thousands of times, and there are numerous planes that fly overhead heading north towards either dayton airport or somewhere else, and they're are numerous hospitals in the area so seeing helicopters is a normal occurrence. 
what i proceeded to see was a fire orange color sphere ball (the color of a candle flame) and it was flying relatively slowly. standing on the balcony, attempting to judge its distance, it had to have been directly over the ohio river, it wasn't very high in the sky either, it was almost eye level with us on the balcony just a few miles away. it was moving to our right, so from the northern kentucky, downtown cincinnati area headed towards eastern indiana. as it flew it never really increased speed nor did it climb vertically or change its course what so ever. as it began to get more towards indiana we began to loose sight of the object, of course it was by this time we had finally got the digital camera out but it was too late, the object was to far off.
i remember feeling extremely excited but at the same time disappointed because it was such a short experience. but on another note on talking to other friends from the area, this sighting is nothing new the kid who named it "the flying pumpkin" saw it multiple times in this area, another friend of mine said he saw the same object in the sky recently as well.
i hope this helps and ill keep my eyes open. 
thanks for running such an awesome services, thanks to you.
content.summary: It was a beautiful orange sphere that pulsated sporadically, "flying pumpkin" as dubbed by a friend.

content.detailedDescription: At 10 pm when coming back from the store, while turning into my neighborhood i caught a glimpse of something large in the sky. i thought i was imagining it until my friend asked me if i saw it too. it was large and like nothing i have ever seen. kind of tear drop shaped and it hovered. it was only visible for a couple of minutes and disappeared just as quick as it appeared. we searched our immediate area hoping to see it but with no luck. we did notice increased air traffic in our sky after this happened.
content.summary: 2 eyewitnesses saw a large object hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at home and went outside to smoke i saw a strange dark circle in the sky just below the cloud cover at first i thought it was a balloon but it did not move at all it just hoverd i watched it for about 5 mins then ran inside to grab my camera when i came back out it was still in the same spot which i thought was odd my cameras lense is not so good so even on max zoom it just looks like a spot of dust. i continued watching it for a few more mins the a large commercial airplane flew by and the shape still did not move. i went in to call my husband and when i came back it had vanished. i am not sure what it was and there were no news reports which there usually are although i dont belive they are related our power went out the same night to 685 customers and was out for 1 hr 15 min in my area only. to be honest it frightend me imensly as i said i called my husband and told him i thought i was loosing my mind i was very paranoid for the rest of the day untill he got home.
content.summary: It was a large dark hovering circle.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out on our back porch (4/22/09) at 10pm. i saw a large white blue-ish oval shape shoot across the sky very fast. it was about the size of a penny. by the time i told my husband to turn around and look, it disappeared. it was a clear night and it appeared out of no where and then disappeared. the next night (4/23/09) we were on the back porch at 10pm again and we were talking about what happened the night before. then i saw the same size and color oval ball moving very fast again but on the opposite side of the sky. this time it stayed in the sky longer because i told my husband to turn around and look and he did and he saw it too. we stood up and watched it for another few seconds and then it disappeared again. again it was a clear night. my husband and i were shocked. there were other planes in the sky and this light looked nothing like anything i have ever seen. i have never seen anything fly like this appear and disappear. i am also an amateur astronomer and have been studying the sky for many years. i have seen many comets and shooting stars and this again was unlike anything i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: Fast light appeared and disappeared two nights in a row.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were heading home from colchester to barre after a night at the drive in.  we were on interstate 89 heading south just past exit 14 when i first noticed two bright lights in the sky.  i've sat on the tarmack at o'hare airport enough to know what planes look like when they're "stacked up" waiting to land at night and have their "landing lights" on.  that's what i thought i was seeing.  after driving a few miles i could see a plane that was flying very low, coming in for a landing.  this was on the left side of the interstate near the williston exit.  looking to the right i then saw what i again thought were planes in line to land...But now there were three of the bright lights.  the two on the left were closer together than the one that was farthest to the right.  as we drove a bit further down the road either trees or hills blocked the view of that part of the sky.  i commented to my friend that it seemed very odd that burlington airport would have 3 planes waiting to land...Ever, let alone at that time of night.  he said he thought the lights were too close together to have been planes.  a mile or two down the road, the interstate curves to the right as it goes down a hill...About 2 miles before the richmond exit.  i figured that we would have a good view of the "same" sky when we got there and then we'd have another chance to look at the lights.  however, we never saw the lights again.  the night sky was very dark, no moon...And no clouds.  i believe that, if the lights had been planes, we would have seen them again as they came in to land.  but we never saw or heard a plane landing (after the one we saw landing as we drove past the williston exit.)  the lights appeared to be a almost an orange color, but a very yellow-white orange.  size-wise, the lights appeared bigger than any star or planet i've ever seen in the sky.  i can't say that i saw the lights moving at all, except for seeing 3 lights after earlier having seen 2.  the more i replay it in my mind the more i am reminded of how the planes looked at o'hare airport at night while they are in line waiting to land.  (they also don't appear to move when still far away in the sky because they are, in essence, heading directly at you.)  it was the strangest thing i've seen in the sky in a long, long time.
content.summary: Looked like 3 planes lined up waiting to land. (was 12:12 am, site won't accept that time when entered).

content.detailedDescription:
thursday, april 23, 2009 at 9:05 p.M. central time, a ufo flew over my home in lake charles, louisiana.   we were driving down ryan street heading home, and we turned left by blockbuster video store when i noticed the white lamb shaped cloud that had what appeared to be a genie lamp on its rear end with smoke coming from the lamp.  my husband said that the cloud looked like an elephant to him, and he tried to point out the trunk.  we giggled, and then arrived at our house.  

i was busy getting things out of the van when my husband shouted out, ���hey, - come see what - found!���  thinking to myself that i was about to look at another gecko or some creepy crawly thing i walked over to them.  they were both starring at the sky, and i looked up and saw flashing colored lights floating way up in the sky in slow motion heading south while moving upward toward the doom of the sky.

baffled i asked, ���is that a plane?���  my husband said that there was no way it could be a plane, because planes do not move like that.  he said that - noticed it first, and he said, ���look daddy at the stars moving across the sky!���   

i started to make out the image as triangular with a glowing sphere shield around the base.  it had colored flashing lights that were blue, yellow, and red making the perfect points for a triangle.  i confirmed what i was seeing with my husband, and he said that he saw the same shape i did.  the object was way higher than a plane would normally fly, and it was moving so as if they wanted us to see them.  i waved and said, ���hello, my friends.���  my husband pointed at -, and told me to be quiet.  

we all just watched in awe, and then it speeded up at an impossible speed, and from no where the sky filled with clouds again hiding the object.  my four year old said, ���see momma it was the aliens, because i told you they are always up above the clouds.���
content.shape: Boomerang,  Chevron,  Diamond,  Oval,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: The ufo sighting at my house last night!

content.detailedDescription: An entity was observed looking into my living room window. the window is in the back of my house. i saw the entity looking into my living room window. it ran away when i turned the light on and went outside. the entity moved/ran very quickly and disappeared in the darkness as it ran away from me. the entity was approximately 4 & a half feet tall. there was no communication between the entity and myself. there were no ufo's observed with the sighting of the entity. the entity wore a dark/black one piece suit that did not reflect any light. the duration of the event was very short. approx 1-2 minutes.
content.summary: Entity observed looking into living room window.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
i am a mentally handicap disabled person with slow learning disability.
this morning, before i was on my way to the bus stop on 63rd & austin, i happen to look to the east looking over the lake, i saw this huge bright light in the sky. 

i do not know what in the hell that i���m seeing here, however the object seems to be standing still as this thing was kind of twinkling or flashing in some sort of a way. i���ve took out my little digital hd camcorder; and shot this object thing for over a minute. after i���ve got done shooting and but my camcorder back in my work bag it was gone just like that!

please!!! 
just tell me!!!  what is it that i am seeing here??? 
can you tell me what it is???


note*** 
please do not contact me by cell phone, due do that fact that i may get charges for making and receiving extra long distance charges, that may reflect on my cell phone bill; unless if this is an extreme absolute emergency!!!...  

thank you very much.
content.summary: What is this that i'm seeing here???

content.detailedDescription: On april 23, 2009, at approximately 20:16 hours, in elk grove, ca, i observed an extremely bright sphere, which appeared to be white or yellow in color, through the blinds on my glass sliding door.  i immediately opened the blinds and observed the sphere from my upper level apartment balcony.  the sphere was brighter than anything i have ever seen in the sky.  the sphere appeared to be traveling directly (northeast) towards my apartment complex before stopping in the sky.  the sphere appeared to sit motionless and soundless in the sky for approximately two minutes.  i quickly grabbed my cell phone (sprint treo 800w) and took a photograph of the sphere as it sat motionless in the sky.  i then ran to my vehicle and retrieved my video camera (sony mini-dv dcr-trv950).  at approximately 20:18 hours, i ran back up to my apartment���s balcony and began video taping the sphere in the sky.  i video taped the sphere in the sky for approximately eleven minutes before it was out of view.  during the eleven minutes, i did not observe the sphere flash or blink.  i continued to observe the sky looking for the opportunity to see the sphere again.  while looking to the west, i did notice another object, which appeared to be flat with lights across the front in the distance.  this object was very far away and i could not see it in great detail, but flat with lights across the front is how i would describe it.  i tried to video tape the object but it was to dark for my camera to reveal anything.  i then called my mother informing her of what i had witnessed.  i continued to monitor the object in the sky while talking to my mother on the phone when i observed a sphere like object appear in very close proximity of flat object.  i sphere just appeared out of nowhere.  the sphere appeared to sit motionless for approximately 30 seconds before disappearing, like shutting off a light switch.  the sphere then reappeared in the same exact location approximately ten seconds later.  the sphere held position for approximately 20-30 more seconds before disappearing completely.  i maintained observation of the flat object for approximately two more minutes and noticed lights which appeared to be circling the object.  it���s hard to be certain due to the distance, but that is how i would describe it.  i lost visual of the object from my position as it appeared to be traveling west.
content.summary: Bright sphere observed in sky over elk grove, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
Video that was on u-tube of an 2008 interview of "victor" who was interviewed by art bell in 1997 or 98 for his radio program.  this interview is a follow-up of some kind done in a car in the middle of the desert and his voice is changed again.  i notice something outside the car at about 6:14 to 6:24.  it starts in the passanger rear window and goes around like a bird or hawk, but then when it passes again it accelerates at unbelievable speeds, i dont know if it is a well done hoax or a hell of a good photoshop, but i thought it was strange that a person from area 51 and s4 who has spoken out before and who has also smuggled out supposed video clips of an alien interogation.  strange that he is alive, but would make sense that he is under constant survellince.  please let me know what you think of this for i am curious to see what the analysis is.  i have been interested in ets, ebes, ufo/usos, and other life in our galaxy for as long as i remember.  started when i saw something in the sky as a child of 8 or 9 and just hovered for about a minute for my mother, grandmother, grandfather, uncle and i to see, all i can remeber is being totally in a panic and sheer terror and it has followed me to this day, but has always left me wondering what it was.  like a huge star that blinked at us twice and then was gone in a flash to the south and accelerated at an unbelievable rate very similar to this object.


i couldnt get it to attach properly so i am going to email it to you at the webmaster email address found at the contact info on you site here.

it is an email to myself and a friend so that i can save it to my computer because it has been deleted twice now from u-tube.
you have my email address above so i dont have to give it here and have millions of people seeing my email address.  thank you and i hope to have an explanation.
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Egg,  Oval,  Sphere,  Other

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo april 23 2009
time was 21:39 april 23rd 2009. it was dark out and the sky was clear. i could see the constellation of orion clearly. in fact the event occurred in close proximity to my view of orion.
my brother and i were just closing the front door of our house for the night from the inside when my brother called me outside. he said look up there ��� he pointed to the sky above the area of the woodbine shopping centre. my brother exclaimed that there were two objects in the sky. i said they must be planes ���cause we live only minutes from the airport. i saw the two lights, one that i am certain was an airplane cause of the flashing light pattern and the relative size of the lights. the object of concern was a very large yellow light and was shaped like a star in the sky (basically round). this yellow object did not flash or blink like an airplane nor did it grow or shrink in size. it just stayed in the same spot for approximately 60 seconds, then moves to one side very quickly and disappeared. when i first saw it (and my brother too) an airplane had been in the same airspace as the yellow orb light thing. the airplane seemed to have come from behind the light (ufo?) and broke away hard from the shared airspace and the plane continued towards the airport and then out of sight. i have lived by the airport all my life (33 years) and i see airplanes every three minutes (i live 2 minutes from the airport). oh, as i am writing this i can remember the absence of noise. in fact, the street was very quite and looked like a dull haze occupied the whole street. i could only hear the faint hum of the highway off in the distance. overall, i must say that the yellow orb (ufo?) is not like any aircraft i���ve ever seen. my brother (older than me) was slightly shaken by the unusual sight too.
thank you for your attention to my observation report.
content.summary: Large yellow orb that didn’t flash, blink or make sound, remained motionless in the sky near an airport, way too large for any aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
East newport maine u.F.O. video march 10th 2009.

the u.F.O. video is up at this these links ----> youtube.Com/user/maineufohunter

part #1 http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=m3ae9r2uf2e

part #2 http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=26km6yb18v8 

i uploaded the video before i made the correction at the beginning, i typed users/ when it really is user without the s. youtube.Com/user/maineufohunter


right now the video is in 2 parts at these links:

part 1 ----> http://www.Sendspace.Com/file/gr3mug

part 2 ---> http://www.Sendspace.Com/file/616jkw

you may be able to view the videos at a larger size over youtube by downloading the sendspace files.

this is a rare video, what i filmed was actually 2 u.F.O. crafts flying in the sky at the same time. make sure to fully watch part 1 and 2 because the crafts can be seen throughout. i filmed roughly 18 minutes of footage, they 2 u.F.O.S were flying around my house for about 1.5 hours.

i first saw a u.F.O. on jan 27th 2009. this sighting was my second sighting on march 10th 2009 at 8:15 pm. ever since jan 27th i had my video recorder ready every night. u.F.O. #1 kept flying a strange pattern in the sky over and over until is finally vanished. it would fly all up around the sky stop at a certain point in the air, come towards my house then fly around to the front sky and it kept doing that over and over.

u.F.O. #2 kept flying from the right of my yard towards the left then it would vanish through the tree line. it would appear again from the right side and it kept repeating that pattern. it is either u.F.O. #2 or a 3rd u.F.O. that flew directly over my house in part 2 of the video. i think it was u.F.O. #2.

sometimes when i zoomed in on the crafts their strobe lights would force my camera to try and refocus, that's why it looks like my camera slightly zooms in and out sometimes during zoomed filming.

that night was really amazing. i have seen about 5 more sightings in march 2009 and about 7 so far in april 2009 being april 4th,8th,10th,18th,20th and 20th (2 seen in same 24 hour time period).

the crafts would change up their light patterns, turn instantly in the reverse direction, change speed patterns, hover, hover downwards, and they flew in patterns that i have never seen any human aircraft fly before.

one one night in april a u.F.O. flew 60 feet over my house, the strobe lights from the craft lit up the fog and i could see the u.F.O. with 100% up close clarity. i could tell it wasn't any man made craft. i estimate 60 feet because i know how much 40 feet is because i have climbed many 40 feet climbing walls before, also i estimated the height of the trees next to my house as a reference also.

i think this is some of the best u.F.O. footage out there right now. also there is a certain spot in hermon maine that the u.F.O. frequently hover over and even have possibly landed at. i may investigate that area in hermon over the next few days.

here is my maine u.F.O. hot spot thread that i originally started --> http://boards.History.Com/topic/ufo-hunters/ufo-hot-spot/520045963


 fyi, none of these crafts were airplanes or helicoptors or jets. i have seen enough of those in the daytime and nighttime to be able to tell the difference between them and u.F.O.S.

these u.F.O. were flying very low in the sky opposed to the normal aircrafts that fly high in the sky in a straight line to their destination.

notice how these u.F.O.S flew in strange patterns and stuck around for 1.5 hours...
content.summary: 2 ufos filmed on video over newport, maine.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving past the petco/inkstop shopping center in lansdale.
2. a plane was stopped in midair a few hundred feet above the petco.
3. it was a white small plane.
4. was stopped in midair for about 1 1/2 minutes, then started moving again.
5. this was very strange, it freaked me out
6. i turned around the corner, and it started moving again.
content.summary: Small white plane stopped in midair, then started again.

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday night, april 21, 2009
my wife and i were standing outside of the treasure island resort in las vegas, nv.  we planned to view and record the 10pm siren's of treasure island show and had been one of the first people to arrive (sometime around 9:15pm) and we moved to a position directly in front of the hotel.

there is not much to do during the 45 minutes leading up to the show, so my wife began talking to people next to us and i was observing the low-flying commercial and private aircraft that were departing mccarran int. airport and flying almost directly overhead from east-to-west.

as more people gathered, sometime between 9:45pm and 9:55pm i noticed a group of people a short distance away from us (maybe 30ft to 40ft) looking up toward the sky and pointing.  my immediate thought was that they were looking at another aircraft as it flew overhead.  i glanced up and could not see anything out of the ordinary...I looked twice, trying to guess the general direction based on where the people were pointing but there was nothing obvious to be seen -- no aircraft or helicopters of any kind.

while i was distracted by looking for whatever the distraction was in the air, the crew for the sirens show had raised a sheet or screen on the deck of the sirens' ship.  i asked my wife when they put that up and she said they had just raised it.  i glanced at my watch and it was almost 10pm.

i started my video camera and aimed it at the screen aboard the sirens' ship while i continued to observe the people nearby looking up and pointing into the sky.  obviously, more people were looking up and pointing than before and i would guess at least 20 to 30 people were looking up at the sky instead of being ready to watch the treasure island show.

once again, i looked up and took a couple of moments to allow my eyes to adjust.  there were no aircraft overhead, so i assumed it must be something much more faint and harder to see than a boeing 737 at 1,200ft.

that's when i saw the object.  it was almost directly overhead, but i would guess that i was looking northward and upwards at an angle of at least 80 degrees.

what i saw was a triangular formation of lights...An open v-shape, perhaps 3-times wider than it was tall.  the leading point of the v was directed several degrees west of due north...Assuming the las vegas strip runs directly north-and-south, i would say that the formation was pointed and moving on an approximate 340-to-345 degree heading.  in the one-to-two seconds that i first observed the object, i concluded that it was not a commercial airliner, nor was it a formation of individual aircraft.  it appeared to me to be a single object, flying at an altitude much greater than that of the departing aircraft from nearby mccarran.

i made a comment out loud to my wife, which you can hear on the video, and i attempted to frame the object with my video camera.  i had the camera lens zoomed in for preparation for the show, and was unable to obviously capture the object on video.  i tried to use the nearby lighting post (one of the many theater lights used for the treasure island show) as a reference guide to frame the object, but either the lens was zoomed in too tightly or the camera's iris could not adjust quickly enough to the change of lighting conditions.

in the background, i heard emergency sirens from somewhere nearby on the strip but i could not say if they were police, fire, or ambulance sirens since i did not turn to look behind us.

i directed my attention back to the treasure island show as it began moments later, and was unable to continue to observe the object.

the total event lasted at least 8-12minutes based on the actions of the crowd and the people who saw the object before i did.  and i have no idea how long the object was in view after i stopped observing it.

i am a licensed private pilot, an amateur videographer, and professional graphic artist.  i have uploaded the video from the event and a photoshop image depicting what i saw.
content.summary: Triangular-formation of lights fly over las vegas on april 21, 2009.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside, alone, on 4/13/09 in ballston spa ny at approximately 10pm.  it was a very clear and fairly dark night.

i saw a bright light, about the size of a star, heading due north.  i have seen satellites on very dark nights before so i assumed that's what it was due to it's apparent altitude, size, brightness, etc.

about 30-45 seconds after i first saw it, it travelled past what i assumed was star, just slightly west of it's path.  as soon as the first object passed the "star", which was stationary (obviously since i thought it was a star), the second object moved directly behind the first and followed it for about 30 seconds or more before it veered due east at a high rate of speed, not so fast that i couldn't follow it but much faster than the first object.  it turned very sharply when it turned, not quite a right angle but it was an extremely sharp turn.

as the object passed over my head i had to turn towards the house and my vision was a bit obsucured by porch lights, but i could still see the objects.  i had called to my brother a few times and he came out of the house after the second object had turned east.  he only came outside in time to see the second object, now heading eastward, but the first object had travelled far enough that it was obscured by the house lights and/or trees because i could no longer locate it.  the second was also soon obscurred by trees but its course at that point was not especially fast or erratic after it had turned away from the first object.

there was nothing remarkable about the color or brightness of these lights and i could not make out any shape.  they did not flash or vary in brightness at any time.  they were just points of light.

the entire event was only about 5 minutes long maximum, probably less.  i would guess that the objects travelled from a position driectly overhead to about 45-50��� from the horizon in this time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light heading due north, then followed by identical light which veered due east.

content.detailedDescription: I left my house in ola arkansas, at approx. 520 am to pay a bill at danville at the drop off box, internet bill. i took i believe it is hwy 27, you can look on the map , it may be hwy 28, but as i got on the long  quiet hwy that seems to take forever to get to dardanelle, long boring road, i noticed a star in the sky that had a tail attached, it seemed to be way out in the universe, a few minutes later , i saw the same star alot closer up to the upper left of my drivers side window, and it appeared to be alot closer,... as in hovering over the nebo mountain. i thought oh its the radio tower but still felt on edge and watched as it moved with in a 100 feet of me and i could see florecent lights 3 , on each side of a triagular figure. i kept thinking i am close to nebo mountain that has to be their lights, but the lights moved closer, i became really scared... rolled up my windows, ran off the road twice trying to get a good look and i saw the same rotating lights 3 on each side of a triangle. my car started a constant vibrating sound(soundelike a flat tire)i started to call 911 and my phone was dead, it was fully charged . then all of a sudden there was a flash, like a light bulb had totally illuminated the road and my vehicle. and then the drive home was non-eventful, my car was driving sound and secure and as i drove futher i was no where near mt, nebo.Although i watched my vehicles clock the entire time , there was no missing time in the event./  what also i would like to add is that this is the second encounter of ufo activity i hve encountered, and 3 othter people in 3 different places can back me up, because in or around 2003 or sometime in that area, 3 different people have seen what i have seen in three different places at the same time. also we have a nuclear plant in london arkansas, it is not far from us, we are in the evacuation route area if this helps any.Also when i got to work i checked my tires and all were fully inflated, no signs of a flat. my phone did not work the rest of the day , i had to fully recharge when i got home, i didnt think it was gonna work for a while, took alot of charging.
content.summary: I noticed a "star in the sky that looked suspicious," i was taking another route to work that does not have much traffic in the early hours.
